snippet: The builders are warning that their construction work is set to be suspended if the Panama Canal Authority does not agree to pay for the overruns within 21 days, “in line with the contractual terms.”
lead_paragraph: The builders are warning that their construction work is set to be suspended if the Panama Canal Authority does not agree to pay for the overruns within 21 days, “in line with the contractual terms.”

headline.main: Dispute Threatens Completion of Panama Canal Expansion
headline.print_headline: Dispute Threatens Completion of Panama Canal Expansion
